name: Ha Long Bay
description: Emerald waters and thousands of towering limestone islands topped by rainforests.

name: Hoi An Ancient Town
description: A well-preserved example of a Southeast Asian trading port dating from the 15th to the 19th century.

name: Imperial City of Hue
description: A vast 19th-century citadel, surrounded by a moat and thick stone walls. It encompasses the Imperial City, with palaces and shrines.

name: Angkor Wat
description: The largest religious structure in the world by land area, originally constructed as a Hindu temple.

name: Kyoto Imperial Palace
description: The former ruling palace of the Emperor of Japan, surrounded by the spacious Kyoto Gyoen National Garden.
